title: Soozier Chest Fly Machine and Chest Press Station, Delt Machine Home Gym Equipment for Chest, Back, Pectoral, Rear Deltoid and Shoulder Training
description: Description:Transform your workout routine with the Soozier chest fly machine! This versatile chest press machine features an adjustable 4-level seat and resistance up to 132 lbs, which is great for any home gym. Crafted for stability and various upper body exercises, it's a must-have for those serious about strength training. Step up your fitness game with this essential home workout equipment.Features:● Chest press and butterfly machine target upper body muscles● Seat adjusts to four levels, enhancing comfort during workouts● Adjustable resistance fits 1" opening weight plates up to 132 lbs (weight is not included)● 2" x 2" steel tube construction for enhanced durability● Anti-slip foot bases ensure stability and safety while exercisingSpecifications:● Color: Red● Materials: Steel, PU● Overall Dimensions: 38.6" L x 43.3" W x 78.1" H● Seat Size: 11.8" L x 11" W x 20.9" -23.8" H● Back Size: 25.2" L x 11" W● Butterfly Arm Spacing: 28.7" W● Max Counterweight: 66 lbs. for a side, 132 lbs. in total● Weight Capacity: 265 lbs.● Item Label: A91-366V00RDPackage Includes:- 1 x Chest Workout Station- 1 x Manual
features: Comprehensive Upper Body Training: This chest machine combines a chest press and butterfly arm features, allowing for a versatile upper body workout in your home gym
Customizable Comfort: Features a 4-level adjustable seat, ensuring users of various heights can exercise comfortably and effectively
Gradual Resistance Adjustment: This pec deck fly machine supports adjustable resistance with compatibility for 1" opening weight plates, enabling 66 lbs. per arm and 132 lbs.
Solid and Stable Build: Constructed with robust 2" x 2" steel tubes and equipped with anti-slip foot bases, this strength training equipment enhances safety and stability during workouts
Overall Dimensions: 38.6" L x 43.3" W x 78.1" H; Weight Capacity: 265 lbs.; Assembly required.

title: RELIFE REBUILD YOUR LIFE Power Tower Pull Up Bar Station Workout Dip Station for Home Gym Strength Training Fitness Equipment
features: Sturdiness and Durability，Supports up to 400 lbs, safety locknut and 4 sturdy suction cups for added stability. The Relife power tower features a robust pull up bar and stays steady without any wobbling or shaking, providing confidence and safety during your workout, whether you're doing pull-ups, push-ups, chin-ups,dips or other exercises.

Multifunction，This multi-function dip station for your home gym supports A Variety Of Exercise routines, including bodyweight rows, vertical knee raises,leg raises, and tricep dips. It helps you build triceps, chest, and shoulder muscles along with incredible upper body strength.Suitable for all fitness and strength-building workouts, also serves as a pull-up rack, leg lift machine, and pull-up dip station.

Adjustable Handle，Features 3 levels of armrest adjustment making it suitable for people with different arm lengths. This dip bar for home adjustable workout equipment ensures greater comfort during leg raises,making it ideal for strength training.

9 Adjustable Heights，The pull up bar features reinforced steel tubing, making it more durable,with two ways to do pull-ups. With 9 adjustable heights,a lowest setting designed for children, the pull-up bar free-standing tower is perfect for the whole family to work out. 4 adjustable wide-fitted backrest settings cater to the whole family's workout needs, providing added comfort for dips.

Thickened Quality Steel Pipe，The thicker steel tubing enhances the durability of the pull-up tower. The push-up bars are seamlessly integrated into the bottom steel tubing of the pull-up and dip station, improving stability and ensuring safety during workouts.

Compact Fitness Equipment，Our Relife pull up bar dip station is easy to assemble.The compact design of the pull up rack is convenient for home gyms with limited space. Ideal for those with limited space.

About RELIFE, Assembling all parts, please ensure that all screws are tightened. We back our quality with a 1-year warranty. If you have any questions, feel free to contact us email, We will help you to solve within 12 hours.

title: Body Solid Powerline (PPA13X) PEC Attachment for PSM144X Smith Machine for Boosting Upper Muscle Development, Compact Workout Station for Commercial and Home Gym
description: Product DescriptionPowerLine Pec Attachment. Perform Pec Flys for fast and effective chest development. Unique design allows unilateral and bilateral movement with even resistance on both pec arms. Thick DuraFirm back pad provides user comfort. NOTE PLA144X Lat Attachment must be installed prior to use. For use with PSM144X Powerline Smith Machine onlyAmazon.comAdd pec flys to your Smith-based workout routine with the Powerline PPA13X pec attachment. Designed exclusively for use with the PSM144X Powerline Smith machine, the unit features a unique design that allows for both unilateral and bilateral movement. As a result, the resistance will be equal on both arms, so you'll develop your chest muscles faster and more effectively. The unit also includes a DuraFirm back pad for added comfort during your workouts. The Powerline pec attachment carries a 10-year warranty on the frame and a one-year warranty on all other parts.
features: INDUSTRY LEADER: For 30+ years, Body Solid has held the widest array of products designed to meet the demands of the ever-changing fitness industry (home gym, free weight machines, treadmills, bikes, ellipticals, weight plates, kettlebells, dumbbells, flooring, accessories and more). Our products are cutting edge and reliable and are built for Life……Your Life.

OPTIMIZE MUSCLE GROWTH WITH UNIQUE DESIGN: Elevate your training sessions with the PEC Attachment's bilateral and unilateral movement features, ensuring equal resistance on both arms, driving faster and well-rounded muscle development. This attachment transforms your standard workout station into an advanced gym machine, maximizing both strength gains and symmetry. Your fitness aspirations are achieved more efficiently, creating a powerful impact on your physique.

UPGRADE YOUR SMITH MACHINE WITH SEAMLESS INTEGRATION: Transform your space into a state-of-the-art gym with this perfect addition to your Smith machine. This attachment effortlessly blends with your existing PSM144X Smith Machine setup, so you can expand your workout variety and capabilities.

UNMATCHED COMFORT FOR INTENSE WORKOUTS: Experience the luxury of a DuraFirm back pad, providing superior support and comfort during intense sessions. Say goodbye to strain and hello to a more relaxed and efficient workout experience. With comfort at its core, this attachment makes your commercial and home gym feel and look professional, encouraging long-term consistency in muscle-building routines.

ROBUST CONSTRUCTION FOR LONG-LASTING PERFORMANCE: Built by Body Solid, this PEC Attachment embodies durability and quality, standing resilient against your most demanding workouts. It's an investment that aligns with your commitment to health and fitness, offering reliability and confidence with every use. Ensure your home gym equipment outlasts trends, providing steadfast support as you push your limits and transform your workout dreams into reality.
